root.TaylorSwift:
<1> What music videos did Taylor Swift direct? I’m Only Me When I’m With You Fearless You Belong With Me Back to December Crazier The Best Day Fifteen Love Story Mine Mean I’m Only Me When I’m With You The Best Day Mine </1> <2> Who has Taylor Swift collaborated with? Ed Sheeran The Civil Wars Paramore Lorde Keith Urban Ellie Goulding Haim Carrie Underwood B.o.B Selena Gomez The Civil Wars Keith Urban B.o.B </2> <3> What musicians made special guest performances with Taylor Swift on her Red Tour? Luke Bryan Nelly Tegan & Sara Patrick Stump Hunter Hayes John Mayer B.o.B Ellie Goulding Rascal Flatts Faith Hill Nelly B.o.B Patrick Stump </3> <4> Who were the opening acts from Taylor Swift’s Fearless World Tour? Ed Sheeran Neon Trees Ellie Goulding Brett Eldredge Florida Georgia Line Kellie Pickler Austin Mahone Gloriana The Vamps Justin Bieber Kellie Pickler Gloriana Justin Bieber </4> <5> What award shows were Taylor Switt’s winning percentage is greater than 50%, with at least 15 nominations? Grammys Academy of Country Music American Music Awards Country Music Awards Billboard Music Awards People’s Choice Awards Teen Choice Awards Brit Awards MTV Video Music Awards MuchMusic Video Awards American Music Awards Billboard Music Awards Teen Choice Awards </5> <6> Who are the directors of Taylor Swift music videos, from the Fearless Album? Trey Fanjoy Shawn Robbins Christian Lamb Shane Drake Todd Cassetty Yoann Lemoine Noble Jones Phillip Andelman Declan Whitebloom Roman White Trey Fanjoy Roman White Todd Cassetty </6>
<7> Which songs went at least 2x Platinum, by RIAA metrics, on Taylor Swift’s self-titled album? Should’ve Said No Picture to Burn Stay Beautiful Tied Together with a Smile Teardrops on My Guitar Tim McGraw A Place in this World The Outside Our Song I’m Only Me When I’m WIth You Picture to Burn Teardrops on My Guitar Our Song </7>

root.CarrieUnderwood:
<1> Which Singles were released from the Some Hearts album? Lessons Learned Some Hearts The Night Before Starts with Goodbye We’re Young and Beautiful Don’t Forget to Remember Me That’s Where It is I Just Can’t Live a Lie Wasted Whenever You Remember Some Hearts Don’t Forget to Remember Me Wasted </1> <2> Which singles were released on the Play On album? Undo It Quitter Songs Like This Look at Me Cowboy Casanova Change This Time Someday When I Stop Loving You Unapologize Temporary Home Temporary Home Cowboy Casanova Undo It </2> <3> Which Singles peaked in the top 5 on the country charts and top 15 on US Charts? So Small Before He Cheats Jesus, Take the Wheel I Told You So Inside Your Heaven Cowboy Cassanova Undo It Last Name Two Black Cadillacs Good Girl Before He Cheats I Told You So Cowboy Cassanova </3> <4> Which songs were a duet Carrie Underwood had with Brad Paisley? When I Get Where I’m Going Oh Love Remind Me High Life It Had to Be You Is It Still Over Whiskey Lullaby Southern Comfort Zone This is Country Music Can’t Stop Lovin’ You Oh Love Remind Me High Life </4> <5> Which Carrie Underwood singles have gone double platinum in the US? Before He Cheats Cowboy Casanova Last Name Temporary Home Don’t Forget to Remember Me Blown Away All-American Girl I Told You So Two Black Cadillacs Jesus Take the Wheel Blown Away Cowboy Casanova Jesus Take the Wheel </5> <6> Which songs were nominated for Song/Single Record of the Year at an Awards Show? All-American Girl Temporary Home Cowboy Casanova Good Girl Undo It Before He Cheats Two Black Cadillacs Jesus, Take the Wheel Last Name Blown Away Jesus, Take the Wheel Before He Cheats Cowboy Casanova </6> <7> What TV shows did Carrie Underwood make a guest appearance on? The Big Bang Theory Hawaii Five-O Modern Family How I Met Your Mother Two Broke Girls Boston Legal Blue Bloods Law & Order SVU CSI Nashville Nashville Blue Bloods How I Met Your Mother </7>

root.TheBeatles:
<1> Which Beatles singles went 2x Platinum by RIAA certification? Let It Be Love Me From Me to You Get Back Don’t Let Me Down The Inner Light Hey Jude Twist and Shout Something Come Together For You Blue Got to Get You into My Life Get Back Don’t Let Me Down Something Come Together Let It Be </1> <2> Which Beatles singles had 3 different versions of the music video? I Feel Fine Hey Jude Rain Revolution Day Tripper Baby It’s You We Can Work it Out Real Love Paperback Writer Lady Madonna Day Tripper We Can Work it Out Rain </2> <3> What years did Michael Lindsay-Hogg direct a Beatles music video? 1966 1960 1967 1962 1964 1965 1969 1961 1963 1968 1966 1968 1969 </3> <4> What Beatles studio albums went Diamond in Canada or the US? Live at the BBC Sgt. Pepper’s Lonely Hearts Club 1962-1966 The Early Beatles Abbey Road Love Songs 1967-1970 The Beatles Stereo Box Set The Beatles (White Album) 1 Sgt. Pepper’s Lonely Hearts Club The Beatles (White Album) Abbey Road </4> <5> What American record labels released Beatles studio albums in the 1960’s? Polydor EMI Pickwick Parlophone Apple Records Vee-Jay United Artists MGM Atco Lingasong Vee-Jay United Artists Apple Records </5> <6> What countries did the label Parlophone release Beatles albums in? Canada Portugal France United Kingdom Czech Republic United States Italy Germany New Zealand Spain Italy United Kingdom New Zealand </6>
<7> Who directed Beatles Films from the 1960’s? Kathy Dougherty Michael Lindsay-Hogg Richard Lester Bob Smeaton Patrick Montgomery Adrian Wills George Dunning Neil Aspinall Geoff Wonfor Tony Bramwell Richard Lester George Dunning Kathy Dougherty </7>
